alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:58PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Owyhee and east central Malheur Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parsnip Peak, or 31 miles east of Rome, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Castro Ridge around 210 PM MDT. Parsnip Peak, Antelope Reservoir and Jordan Valley around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
